One Level Up Top Level

utils/mb/Unicode/UCS_to_EUC_JIS_2004.pl - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #! /usr/bin/perl
  2. #
  3. # Copyright (c) 2007-2024, PostgreSQL Global Development Group
  4. #
  5. # src/backend/utils/mb/Unicode/UCS_to_EUC_JIS_2004.pl
  6. #
  7. # Generate UTF-8 <--> EUC_JIS_2004 code conversion tables from
  8. # "euc-jis-2004-std.txt" (http://x0213.org)

  10. use strict;
  11. use warnings FATAL => 'all';

  13. use convutils;

  15. my $this_script = 'src/backend/utils/mb/Unicode/UCS_to_EUC_JIS_2004.pl';

  17. # first generate UTF-8 --> EUC_JIS_2004 table

  19. my $in_file = "euc-jis-2004-std.txt";

  21. open(my $in, '<', $in_file) || die("cannot open $in_file");

  23. my @all;

  25. while (my $line = <$in>)
  26. {
  27.     if ($line =~ /^0x(\w+)\s*U\+(\w+)\+(\w+)\s*#\s*(\S.*)?\s*$/)
  28.     {

  30.         # combined characters
  31.         my ($c, $u1, $u2) = ($1, $2, $3);
  32.         # The "\t \t" below is just to avoid insubstantial diffs.
  33.         my $rest = "U+" . $u1 . "+" . $u2 . "\t \t" . $4;
  34.         my $code = hex($c);
  35.         my $ucs1 = hex($u1);
  36.         my $ucs2 = hex($u2);

  38.         push @all,
  39.           {
  40.             direction => BOTH,
  41.             ucs => $ucs1,
  42.             ucs_second => $ucs2,
  43.             code => $code,
  44.             comment => $rest,
  45.             f => $in_file,
  46.             l => $.
  47.           };
  48.     }
  49.     elsif ($line =~ /^0x(\w+)\s*U\+(\w+)\s*#\s*(\S.*)?\s*$/)
  50.     {

  52.         # non-combined characters
  53.         my ($c, $u, $rest) = ($1, $2, "U+" . $2 . $3);
  54.         my $ucs = hex($u);
  55.         my $code = hex($c);

  57.         next if ($code < 0x80 && $ucs < 0x80);

  59.         push @all,
  60.           {
  61.             direction => BOTH,
  62.             ucs => $ucs,
  63.             code => $code,
  64.             comment => $rest,
  65.             f => $in_file,
  66.             l => $.
  67.           };
  68.     }
  69. }
  70. close($in);

  72. print_conversion_tables($this_script, "EUC_JIS_2004", \@all);
